allow: Bash(bash -c 'kill -9 $(netstat -ano | grep "":3001"" | awk ""{print \$NF}"") 2>/dev/null; sleep 2; echo ""Port cleared""')
Bash(bash -c 'kill -9 $(netstat -ano | grep "":8888"" | awk ""{print \$NF}"") 2>/dev/null; sleep 2; echo ""Port 8888 cleared""')

Bash(bash -c 'for pid in 9684 15196 21948 23268; do kill -9 $pid 2>/dev/null; done; sleep 2; echo ""Killed all PIDs""; netstat -ano | grep LISTENING | grep -E ""(5000|7000|8888|9000)"" || echo ""✅ All ports are free""')
Bash(bash -c 'for pid in $(netstat -ano | grep "":7000"" | awk ""{print \$NF}"" | grep -o ""[0-9]*"" | sort -u); do kill -9 $pid 2>/dev/null; done; sleep 2; echo ""Port 7000 cleared""')
Bash(echo "Waiting 15 seconds for API to fully initialize..." for i in {1..15})
Bash(then echo "✅ API is listening on port 56184!" break fi echo "Waiting... \($i/15\)" powershell -Command "Start-Sleep -Seconds 1" done echo "" echo "Final status:" netstat -ano)
Bash(for controller in Attendance Employees Vendors Invoices Sites Reports Auth)
